website_summaries.verdict: A 5-tool kit for treating the toughest ingrown nails.
pros: This kit includes stainless steel tools not only to fix ingrown toenails but also to prevent them
Each tool is easy to use and the zippered carrying case is convenient
cons: Some customers felt that the blades of the nipper and scissors could be sharper

customer_reviews.title: The best way that I can describe it is the precision ...
customer_reviews.text: After having had the opportunity to use this kit I found that all of the parts work as expected except the piece I primarily made this purchase for and that is the "Precision Toenail Clippers". After only three uses the tips of the cutters deformed and now have become become completely unusable. The best way that I can describe it is the precision has left the tool. I contacted the manufacturer about this issue and the customer service was great they sent a replacement piece out right away. Based on the great customer service I would certainly purchase products from them in the future.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Exactly what was needed
customer_reviews.text: I needed the hemostats and the lifters more than the snippers so ymmv. I like the hinge on the snippers more than other types I've seen. Glad I purchased.
customer_reviews.author: Whit

customer_reviews.title: A tool for every issue
customer_reviews.text: This kit is EXACTLY what you need if you've got an ingrown toenail. It's got tools to PREVENT them in the future, and a tool to cut your toe nails correctly so you'll never get them again. If you've had ingrown toenails before, i Highly RECOMMEND buying this set to keep on hand in case they come back. That way you can keep them at bay before they get infected and you have to go to the dr. Thanks Dermatool
customer_reviews.author: Whitney E.

customer_reviews.title: Works great
customer_reviews.text: This kit works great for keeping my ingrown toenails under control. Read the included booklet, and follow the instructions. Otherwise, things may get very painful!
customer_reviews.author: TechMan

customer_reviews.title: Perfect kit
customer_reviews.text: Works great! Able to get under the ingrown edge and clip it with minimal pain! Perfect kit!
customer_reviews.author: Sarah V.

customer_reviews.title: You should get it
customer_reviews.text: I'm not much of a detailed writer, so I'm just gonna say this: this product is great for getting that hard to reach nail that's poking into the side of your toe. I was able to get it out after soaking my feet for about 30min and easily too with the lock-in tweezers and small snippers. I would recommend it any day now that I have it.
customer_reviews.author: Jeremy Rogers

customer_reviews.title: Great Product.
customer_reviews.text: Gift for a Grand Daughter in college with an ingrown toenail. She loves this set. No more ingrown toenails for her. Keep on doing great Jacklyn Grammy's Angel.
customer_reviews.author: itsjustme

customer_reviews.title: Great Kit!
customer_reviews.text: So far, I really like the kit. I was able to get a large, painful piece of the nail from my toe. The only thing not great about the kit so far is the pair of scissors. Other than that, its a great kit, and I am happy I found it.
customer_reviews.author: C. Gray

customer_reviews.title: WORKS GREAT ON BASIC INGROWN NAIL
customer_reviews.text: Great set of tools that allowed me to treat my own toe and avoid surgery! However, if you have the "C-type" ingrown nail then a Podiatrist is the only one that will relieve your pain.

customer_reviews.title: Toe saver!

customer_reviews.title: The nippers are good though.

customer_reviews.title: Great Customer Service
customer_reviews.text: When my kit came, I was disappointed as there was a duplicate of one tool, while another was missing. The CSR service was friendly and they replied with a sense of urgency, sending out a replacement kit at no extra charge. The kit itself is really decent, the tools are sturdy and the kit is compact and well organized and comes with basic use instructions. I recently developed issues with an ingrown toenail and this kit helps me go above and beyond in working with the prescribed treatment. This product is very well backed by the cutomer service team.
customer_reviews.author: John A.  Stansbury

customer_reviews.title: Awesome kit, very sleak.
customer_reviews.text: This kit is great, I've been looking for something to treat my ingrown nails for a while and this is definitely it. I get these almost monthly and this kit makes dealing with that so much easier. It comes with a good variety of tools that are excellent quality, and it also helps with cleaning the nails so much easier. I definitely love this brand and i will keep buying. Also, The price is just right and it's very neatly stored, I recommend this to everyone.
customer_reviews.author: Andres J.

customer_reviews.title: Working so far. Went from a water hammer that ...

customer_reviews.title: High quality and easy to use
customer_reviews.text: I had two ingrown toenails from a poor pedicure. My two large toes were in so much pain I had to do something. First, I Googled how to take care of them and then headed to Amazon for a kit. Not having had ingrown toenails before, I found this kit included everything recommended in my research and easy to use. The tools are of high quality and the case is excellent way to keep them in good condition.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great products!!
customer_reviews.text: The tools are great quality and work very well! I've had ingrown nails before and had to try and dig them out. These tools work great and even better when you use Lido a one cream to skin prior.
customer_reviews.author: Barbara A. Dargan

customer_reviews.title: Great kit, nice price (hemostats are too big)
customer_reviews.text: I was worried about the straight cutters. People said they arrived chipped or they broke during use. This was the main thing I needed. But! My kit is great. You do have to soak your feet before you cut toenails to make them softer. I will say the included hemostats are way too large to really be useful in a toenail situation. I will be replacing them. But other than that im happy with my kit. Its going to save me another trip to the podiatrist since he didnt burn them they will be back.
customer_reviews.author: Melissa

customer_reviews.title: Bad quality, corroded metal
customer_reviews.text: This is not at all a premium product as it is said in its name, actually it is a very low quality one, we just need to throw it away because it can't be used and the metal looks really bad and corroded. I'm so sorry we haven't look at it right after we got it in order to be able to send it back. It's a waste of money, don't buy it.
customer_reviews.author: Bogdan F.

customer_reviews.title: Well worth the money.
customer_reviews.text: I've had ingrown toenails for years, and this set of tools are a godsend. What would take a half hour of painful searching and snipping now takes a few minutes. Not entirely pain free, but much better than before. And when I'm done, I'm sure I'm done.

product_meta.title: Ingrown Toenail Treatment Kit - Complete Podiatrist Premium Set by DERMATOOL - Stainless Steel Toenail Clippers, Hemostat, File, Lifter and Scissors for Pedicure, Toenails and Nails - Foot Care Kit
product_meta.description:
#1 Best and Most Complete Kit

 Do your Feet suffer from toenails? 

Do you have a that causes pain, difficulty in walking, redness or swelling?

Are you picking at your toenails with improper ?

Get Rid of your painful NOW!

★5 Distinct individual versatile necessary tool including Superior Grip. Straight Cutting Nipper and scissors to help avoid future curved , Dual sided file with straight and angled tips, dual sided with thin pointed packer for cleaning under , applying creams or ointments and making it easier to pack cotton swabs under smaller and hemostat clamp to help hold in place while cutting or removing skin or bits.

★Our skin care implements are all skin safe stainless steel Simply use alcohol to clean. Laser engraved to show quality control, no compromises are made.

★ONLY Our Product provides Professional High Quality Performance Implements with Ergonomic non-slip grip Appropriately Balanced and Designed for optimal Handling and Results.

★The only TRUE All Inclusive Versatile with a Sleek Leather Zipper Case.

★ Second to none Customer Service, if you are not satisfied with your product, simply return it for a full refund or exchange!

NOTE: Not to be used if you suffer from Diabetes.
feature_bullets: ✅ 5 PREMIUM QUALITY TOOLS — Anvil Head Toenail Nipper, Angled & Straight Toenail File, Toenail Lifter w/ Packer and Cleaning Tip, Straight Nail Scissors, Hemostat Clamp in Polished Finish with Case and User Guide.
✅ SUPERIOR & UNIQUE GRIP TOOLS — With Non-Slip Secure Serrated Grips for Precise, Delicate Situations available on market for Ingrown Toenail File and Lifter.
✅SINGLE HINGED NIPPER — Completely Retractable and Closing Nipper for Safe Storage and stowaway.
✅ PROFESSIONAL SURGICAL GRADE TOOLS: Made of High Quality, Premium Rust-Proof Stainless Steel for long lasting usage. Preferred by Podiatrist & Chiropody use.
✅ ORDER RISK FREE: DERMATOOL Brand is recognized as a Premium Grade and Expertly Manufactured Instrument. SECOND TO NONE Customer Service, no questions asked refund or exchange policy.
